name: Stick Archer RPG V2
description:
Play as a stick-man archer to defeat the slime monsters and finally defeat the dragon.

Killing slimes will give exp and gold. Use the gold to buy various skills and make yourself stronger.

How to play:

Hold and release 'z' button to attack

Use arrow keys for movement

Press space-bar to jump

Click on the NPCs to buy skills, strengthen the monsters, or summon the boss.

Use the menu button in the bottom right corner to save the game, and upgrade your stats.
